data.title: Earning Millions on Twitter? Top 10 Creators Shared Their Earnings!!!
data.meta_description: Since Elon Musk announced Twitter’s Ads Revenue Sharing model in February this year many of us were waiting for the first payout.  Twitter’s way of working is changing with its new money-sharing…
data.text:
Introduction

Twitter’s way of working is changing with its new money-sharing program. The quiet days on Twitter turned into something big, like a storm. Verified users can now earn money from ads in their replies. Let’s learn more about this new way of making money on Twitter and find out how much money some of the big accounts on Twitter are making.

Twitter surprised everyone with a money-sharing program for verified users. They can earn money from ads in their replies. Even though these ads can be annoying, they can also bring cash to verified creators. People on Twitter got excited about this news.
